Sandra Bullock Balik ke Netflix Lewat 'Unforgiven'
06 Nov 2019, 06:28 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Sandra Bullock kembali terlibat dalam proyek Netflix terbaru bertajuk 'Unforgiven'. (ANGELA WEISS / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Aktris Sandra Bullock kembali ke Netflix usai film 'Bird Box'. Kali ini ia akan main dalam film bertajuk 'Unforgiven', diadaptasi dari serial asal Inggris yang tayang 2009 silam.Melansir Entertainment Weekly, Unforgiven akan ditulis oleh Christopher McQuarrie. Ia sebelumnya dikenal karena menyutradarai dan menulis dua film terakhir 'Mission Impossible'.Sementara kursi sutradara akan diduduki oleh Nora Fingscheidt. Sineas asal Jerman ini sebelumnya telah memimpin proyek film Bruderlein (2013) dan System Crasher (2019).Belum terungkap karakter apa yang akan diperankan Bullock. Pun begitu dengan jalan cerita yang mempunyai dua kemungkinan, bisa sama seperti serial, bisa juga benar-benar berbeda.Serial Unforgiven bercerita tentang perempuan bernama Ruth Slater (Suranne Jones) yang berusaha menjalani hidup normal setelah keluar dari penjara. Sementara masyarakat sekitar tidak menerima kehadirannya.


Sandra Bullock ketika berperan dalam 'Bird Box' yang menjadi kerja sama perdananya dengan Netflix. (dok. Netflix)

Film ini akan menjadi kerja sama yang ketiga antara Bullock dengan Netflix. Setelah tampil di film Bird Box, Bullock menjadi produser dalam film Reborn.Bila diperhatikan, geliat Netflix dalam tiga tahun belakangan terbilang progresif. Selain banyak mengadaptasi cerita, mereka kerap bekerja sama dengan aktor dan aktris kenamaan internasional. Selain itu, mereka tengah gencar menyasar pasar Asia lewat berbagai film dan serial asal Asia. (adp/rea)

Sandra Bullock returns to Netflix via 'Unforgiven'
Nov 6 2019, 06:28 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Sandra Bullock is again involved in the latest Netflix project titled 'Unforgiven'. (ANGELA WEISS / AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actress Sandra Bullock returns to Netflix after the film 'Bird Box'. This time he will play in the film titled 'Unforgiven', adapted from the British series that aired 2009 ago. Launching Entertainment Weekly, Unforgiven will be written by Christopher McQuarrie. He was previously known for directing and writing the last two films 'Mission Impossible'. While the director's chair will be occupied by Nora Fingscheidt. The German filmmaker has previously led the film project Bruderlein (2013) and System Crasher (2019). Not yet revealed what character will be played by Bullock. Even so with the storyline that has two possibilities, can be the same as the series, can also be completely different. Unforgiven series tells the story of a woman named Ruth Slater (Suranne Jones) who tried to live a normal life after getting out of prison. While the surrounding community did not accept his presence.


Sandra Bullock when playing a role in 'Bird Box' which became her first collaboration with Netflix. (doc. Netflix)

This film will be the third collaboration between Bullock and Netflix. After appearing in the film Bird Box, Bullock became a producer in the film Reborn. When observed, stretching Netflix in the past three years is fairly progressive. In addition to adapting many stories, they often work closely with international actors and actresses. In addition, they are aggressively targeting the Asian market through various films and serials from Asia. (adp / rea)
